Errors.TokenExpired: The provided verfication token has expired or has already been used.
Errors.Configuration: There is something wrong with the server configuration. If this persists please contact the server administrator.
Errors.Generic: Sorry, no further information is available at this time. If this persists please contact the server administrator.

Verify.LoginLinkSent: A login link has been sent to the provided email address.
Verify.CheckAgain: If you haven't received the email in a few minutes check your spam folder. If it isn't there either please try again.
Verify.CanClose: You can close this window, you won't need it for logging in.
